hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /u/scripts/eol_php_code/applications/content_server/resources/
zip "PRM_REP_reports_$(date +"%Y-%m-%d").zip" taxon_summary_resource.txt parent_taxon_summary_resource.txt parent_basal_values_resource.txt lifeStage_statMeth_resource.txt basal_values_resource.txt taxon_summary.tar.gz parent_taxon_summary.tar.gz parent_basal_values.tar.gz basal_values.tar.gz
#Habitat and distribution representative records #taxon summary new records: basalvalues.tar.gz basal_values.tar.gz #parent taxon summary new records: parentbasalvalues.tar.gz parent_basal_values.tar.gz #taxon summary flagged records: basalvaluesresource.txt.zip basal_values_resource.txt #parent taxon summary flagged records: parentbasalvaluesresource.txt.zip parent_basal_values_resource.txt
#Ecological association representative records #taxon summary new records: taxonsummary.tar.gz taxon_summary.tar.gz #parent taxon summary new records: parenttaxonsummary.tar.gz parent_taxon_summary.tar.gz #taxon summary flagged records: taxonsummaryresource.txt.zip taxon_summary_resource.txt #parent taxon summary flagged records: parenttaxonsummaryresource.txt.zip parent_taxon_summary_resource.txt
zip "basal_values_resource.txt.zip" basal_values_resource.txt zip "parent_basal_values_resource.txt.zip" parent_basal_values_resource.txt zip "taxon_summary_resource.txt.zip" taxon_summary_resource.txt zip "parent_taxon_summary_resource.txt.zip" parent_taxon_summary_resource.txt
zip "Numerical_value.zip" lifeStage_statMeth_resource.txt
sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp basal_values.tar.gz eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/. sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp parent_basal_values.tar.gz eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/. sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp basal_values_resource.txt.zip eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/. sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp parent_basal_values_resource.txt.zip eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/.
sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp taxon_summary.tar.gz eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/. sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp parent_taxon_summary.tar.gz eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/. sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp taxon_summary_resource.txt.zip eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/. sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp parent_taxon_summary_resource.txt.zip eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/.
sshpass -f "/home/eagbayani/.pwd_file" scp Numerical_value.zip eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/.
#sshpass -p "enter your pw" scp eli.txt eagbayani@eol-archive:/extra/other_files/SDR/. #->not safe
